resources.string: To easily connect with friends and family, allow Gravity access to your contacts and your device\'s location while you use the app.
\"Gravity\" would like to use your location.\nGravity shows you nearby events To start browsing choose \"OK\"
\"Gravity\" would like to access your contacts.\nThis helps Gravity start building your friends list. To bring in friends from your contacts choose \"OK\"
Gravity will send you an SMS to verify your phone number.
Enter your country code and phone number.
Enter your name and choose a profile image
Gravity is better with more friends
We don\'t use this data and we\'ll never post without your permission.
This page only shown if you \ndid not log in w any other platforms
